meanings.sent1: The yobbery of the teenager was causing trouble in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The yobbery in the park led to complaints from residents.
meanings.sent3: The yobbery at the party was getting out of hand.
meanings.sent4: His yobbery was like a storm disrupting the peace.
meanings.sent5: The yobbery of the group was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Acts of vandalism or violence committed by yobs.
meanings.sent1: The police were called to investigate the yobbery in the area.
meanings.sent2: Yobbery often results in damage to public property.
meanings.sent3: The yobbery at the school was a serious issue.
meanings.sent4: The yobbery left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The yobbery of the gang was escalating.
